items.title: Indian Markets Open Weak After Six-Day Rally, Nifty Slips Below 25,000; Financials, Metals Drag
items.description: Analysts suggest a buy-on-dips strategy for the Nifty. Investors now await US Fed Chair Jerome Powell’s Jackson Hole speech for global cues.
